Valencia, ongoing contacts with Chelsea for Batshuayi: the latest

Valencia are looking to make several additions in the summer transfer market. With a deal for Kevin Gameiro nearly done, the La Liga side are making a push for Michy Batshuayi. Contacts are ongoing with Chelsea for the Belgian forward, who spent last season on loan at Borussia Dortmund. Simone Zaza will be looking for a new home for next season, however no move has materialized yet for the Italian.
